mapper.select: select distinct bnd_group.group_no group_no , bnd_group.group_name group_name , bnd_group.group_category group_category , bnd_group.group_subcategory group_subcategory , bnd_groupjoin.group_joindate group_joindate , bnd_groupjoin.member_level member_level from bnd_member, bnd_groupjoin, bnd_group where bnd_groupjoin.member_id = #{member_id} and bnd_groupjoin.group_no = bnd_group.group_no order by bnd_groupjoin.group_joindate
mapper.update: update bnd_group set group_code = #{group_code} , group_codedate = sysdate where group_no = #{group_no}
mapper.select: select group_no , group_name from bnd_group where group_code=#{group_code}
select group_no from bnd_group where group_name = #{group_name}
select group_name from bnd_group where group_no = #{group_no}
select distinct group_subcategory from bnd_group where group_subcategory like #{subcat} || '%'

select group_subcategory group_subcategory , rank count from (select group_subcategory , count(*) rank from bnd_group where group_regdate between trunc(sysdate - (interval '1' month), 'mm') and last_day(sysdate - (interval '1' month)) group by group_subcategory order by rank desc) where rownum < 4
